job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltemgtMachine LearningML EngineerltemgtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltemgtCool Minds LLCltemgtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltemgtLocation Austin TX Remote until Covid and Candidates who can work in PST will be given the preferenceltemgtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltemgtJob Requirementsltemgtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt5 years of industry experience or a PhD and in addition minimum 2 years industry experience in applied Machine learningltligtltligtStrong coding skills in PythonJavaScala or equivalentltligtltligtExperience with distributed data processing tools like Hive Spark Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferredltligtltligtSolid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in productionltligtltligtExperience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plusltligtltligtExperience with Docker Kubernetes Spark is a plusltligtltligtExperience with distributed data processing tools like Hive Spark Airflow is a plusltligtltligtIndustry experience building endtoend Machine Learning Infrastructure a bigplusltligtltulgt
